titleStmt.title: A true copy of a message sent to General Monck from severall officers of the Army, October twenty nine, 1659
titleStmt.author: Lambert, John, 1619-1683.

notesStmt.note: Concerning Monck's and the Army's dissatisfactions with the undersigned officers "on mistaken grounds".
Thomason copy imperfect; staining with loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
